name: Invaders of Andromeda
description:
Play as a hero of your town and fend off the invaders of Andromeda!

This is a small project that my groupmates and I made using the game engine Monogame. 

How to play:

WASD or arrow keys to move the character.

Use your mouse cursor to aim and Left Click to shoot.

Press the escape key to go back to the main menu.

Credits: 

Joseph Charles Balisalisa - Main Programmer and Sound/Music Department 

Cedric James Lora - Game Designer
